events.message: I recently ordered a jacket that arrived the wrong size and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product size.
The case has been assigned to Agent Maria for further handling and customer communication.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m Maria and I’ll be helping you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the jacket you received? This will help us process your refund faster.
Sure, my order number is 458927 and I’ve attached a photo showing the jacket with the size tag on the inside clearly visible.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send you a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket at no cost.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help resolving this issue so smoothly.
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm you received your refund and that everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Since the refund was confirmed received, we will now close your case. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to gather feedback on your experience. Your input is very valuable to us.
